text: @NYGovCuomo Artwork by legendary artist Chris Shaw (@ShawPoster). He is encouraging people to share digitally, print at home + post in local communities, a home window or in places where people aren't practicing physical distancing. Hi res image available for posters+.  #SaferAtHome #COVID19 https://t.co/OpSDclcggX
